author: vinodkv
msg: MAPREDUCE-5466. Changed MR AM to not promote history files of intermediate AMs in case they are exiting because of errors and thus help history-server pick up the right history file for the last successful AM. Contributed by Jian He.

author: kihwal
msg: HDFS-4994. Audit log getContentSummary() calls. Contributed by Robert Parker.

author: wang
msg: HADOOP-9877. Fix listing of snapshot directories in globStatus. (Binglin Chang via Andrew Wang)

author: fapeeler
msg: added check for /home in exclude list to prevent unwanted deletation of user's /home directoy if it is located on the local disk

author: andy
msg: JENA-519 : Add QuerySolution versions of API operations taking an initial Binding.
